org.forgerock.openicf.common.rpc

Class RemoteRequest<V,E extends Exception,G extends RemoteConnectionGroup<G,H,P>,H extends RemoteConnectionHolder<G,H,P>,P extends RemoteConnectionContext<G,H,P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openicf.common.rpc.RemoteRequest<V,E,G,H,P>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteOperationRequest

    public abstract class RemoteRequest<V,E extends Exception,G extends RemoteConnectionGroup<G,H,P>,H extends RemoteConnectionHolder<G,H,P>,P extends RemoteConnectionContext<G,H,P>>
extends Object
    A RemoteRequest represents a locally requested procedure call executed remotely.

    The RemoteRequest and LocalRequest are the representation of the same call on caller and receiver side.
